casename: Chuan & Company Pte Ltd v Ong Soon Huat
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Judith Prakash J
counsel: Aqbal Singh (Unilegal LLC) for the Appellant; Philip Fong, Josephine Choo (Harry Elias Partnership) for the Respondent
